author: rob_b_auckland
post: Dear Max get a life.You are far too sensitive.Go fishing ,Play golf or do some ironing and oh yes, on the week end the All Blacks thrashed the Frogs 30 0 ho!ho! Ho! I didn’t watch it live but saw the hi lites at the gym.Perhaps the gym may help your liver. May God bless you. Rob..
title: A completely inappropriate experiment. Nice white lab coats, anyway
